surname Zhi; sincere
фамилия Чжи; искренний
rtega_mnemonic:
摯摯RS
挚挚		sincere, warm, cordial, gift
  • hold a hand 執/执 in hand 手: sincere cordial Chinese greeting
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 挚)
Ideographic: To shake 執 hands 手; 執 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
摯愛 [ zhì ài ]: true love
摯友 [ zhì yǒu ]: intimate friend; close friend
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 執 [ zhí ] to execute; to grasp, to hold; to keep; to sieze, to detain
    • 手 [ shǒu ] hand
heisig_chinese_memo: I clench someone's hand after I give an earnest greeting.
heisig_story: Of the many and widely different meanings of this kanji, we select the verbal meaning of clasp, which fits in well with its primitive elements: tenacious . . . hand.
koohiiStory1: When you clasp something you tenaciously 執 hold on to it with your hand 手, te. 真摯、しんし, sincerity, earnestness.
koohiiStory2: This kanji shows Santa Claus (refer to frame tenacious (#1506)) clasping the reins of his deers with his hands, holding onto dear life as he almost falls off his carriage.
Ru_Notes: Kanjidic ошибается, приписывая чтение いたる. Не путать с 至 (いたる、シ приводить, доводить), 撃 (うつ、ゲキ удар, нападение)
Ru_Words:
真摯しんし
  • чистосердечие, искренность, серьёзность
    • 摯実しじつ
  • серьёзный, искренний
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), ノ, 十 (десять), 九 (девять), 手 (рука), 立 (стоять), 辛 (острый на вкус)
Ru_trainchinese: zhì: (графема) (книжн.) искренний, от всего сердца
Kanshudo_mnemonic: with your hand (手) you hold on to (執) seriousness
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I clench someone's hand after I give an earnest apology.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " holding ". " Zhi " in this same " executive " Oracle " executed " or the word " Ji after" increasing " and " shape (ie hand), like the shape of a hand to catch prisoners. During the Warring States period, the Qin script wrote the " hand " under the " hold ", and the small seal and regular script followed it. The original meaning of " zhi " is to hold and grab. "Shuowen": "Zhi, hold it. From hand to hold." Gui Fu's proof: "He who holds it, "Interpretation": "Gong, hold also." Holding is sincere." Such as Song Yu of the Warring States Period "Gao Tang Fu": "The eagle owl, the eagle and the harrier, fly up and down, share the threat of war, and dare to be arrogant." "Selected Works. Wang Ziyuan "Four Sons Talking about Virtue": "Those who are in position and in power are shorter than benevolence and justice, better than cruelty, wolves and tigers grabbing, carrying cruel and thief."

" Zhi " means attack. Such as "Huainanzi. "Shize": "Winter season, when the wind is cold from time to time, the eagles, falcons and fleas will be insured, and the four will be insured." Gao Luu's note: "The eagles, falcons and fleas will strike the people of the four realms." Zhang Pingzi's "Xijing Fu": "The green chrysanthemum is at the bottom of Yun, Han Lu bites at the end of 𦁛." Xue Zong's note: "Zhi, hit also."

" Zhu " means to. "Er Ya. Shiguxia: "Zhi, Zhenye." Such as "Shangshu. "Xibo Kanli": "The sky will not give up its prestige, the life will not be sincere." Kong Chuan: "Zhu, the most." "Lv's Spring and Autumn. "Meng Chun": "The frost and snow are great, the first kind of inaccessibility."

After " sincere ", more sincere. Such as "Ming History. "The Biography of Wang Shouqian": "Move to Yunnan, make his concubine and younger brother Xu Pu go with him, give the book commandments, and speak very earnestly." Lu Xun, "Letter Collection. To Yao Ke: "I heard that Jingyin Yujun’s French is good, but he may not be sincere in translating because his purpose is to sell money."

" Zhi " can be passed " Zhi ", which means a meeting gift for the elders. Such as "Rituals. "Senior Meeting Ceremony": "The guest said to each other: "Someone is not sincere, I dare not meet." Chunguan. Big Zongbo": "Use the birds as the six souls, to wait for the ministers, the lonely to hold the silk, the Qing to hold the lamb, the doctor to hold the goose, the scholar to hold the pheasant, the common man to hold the scorpion, the business and industry to hold the chicken."

" Zhi " is also known as " bird of prey ", which means ferocity. Such as "Book of Rites. "Qu Li Shang": "There is a true beast in front of you, then it will carry brave." Kong Yingdashu: "The true beast, fierce and capable of attack, is said to belong to the tiger and wolf." "Historical Records. "The Biographies of Commodities": "(Bai Kyu) can eat thinly, endure cravings, save clothes, and use the same pains and pleasures as child servants, and look like the hair of a beast and a bird."
humanum_short_description_en: From " hand " to " hold ". The original meaning is to grasp and grab.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」從「執」。「摯」本同「執」，甲骨文的「執」字或在「丮」後增「又」形（即手），像用手捉拿犯人之形。戰國秦系文字把「手」寫在「執」之下，小篆、楷書從之。「摯」的本義是握持、攫取。《說文》：「摯，握持也。从手从執。」桂馥義證：「握持也者，《釋詁》：『拱，執也。』執即摯。」如戰國宋玉〈高唐賦〉：「雕鶚鷹鷂，飛揚伏竄，股戰脅息，安敢妄摯。」《文選．王子淵〈四子講德論〉》：「處位而任政者，皆短於仁義，長於酷虐，狼摯虎攫，懷殘秉賊。」

　　「摯」表示攻擊。如《淮南子．時則》：「行冬令，則風寒不時，鷹隼蚤摯，四鄙入保。」高誘注：「鷹隼蚤摯，擊四界之民。」《文選．張平子〈西京賦〉》：「青骹摯於韝下，韓盧噬於𦁛末。」薛綜注：「摯，擊也。」

　　「摯」表示至。《爾雅．釋詁下》：「摯，臻也。」如《尚書．西伯戡黎》：「天曷不降威，大命不摯。」孔傳：「摯，至也。」《呂氏春秋．孟春》：「霜雪大摯，首種不入。」

　　「摯」後多表示誠懇。如《明史．王守謙傳》：「徙鎮雲南，使其妃弟徐溥同往，賜書戒飭，語極摯切。」魯迅《書信集．致姚克》：「敬隱漁君的法文聽說是好的，但他對於翻譯卻未必誠摯，因為他的目的是在賣錢。」

　　「摯」可通「贄」，表示送給尊長者的見面禮。如《儀禮．士相見禮》：「賓對曰：『某不以摯，不敢見。』」《周禮．春官．大宗伯》：「以禽作六摯，以等諸臣，孤執皮帛，卿執羔，大夫執鴈，士執雉，庶人執鶩，工商執雞。」

　　「摯」又通「鷙」，表示凶猛。如《禮記．曲禮上》：「前有摯獸，則載貔貅。」孔穎達疏：「摯獸，猛而能擊，謂虎狼之屬也。」《史記．貨殖列傳》：「（白圭）能薄飲食，忍嗜欲，節衣服，與用事僮僕同苦樂，趨時若猛獸摯鳥之發。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」從「執」。本義是握持、攫取。

Liushutong characters (3)

摯字的基本解释

摯
zhì
见“挚”。

摯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》脂利切，去至，章。］
“挚1”的繁体字。
(1)握持。
(2)求见人时所持的礼物。俗作“贄”。
(3)搏击，攫取。
(4)诚恳，恳切。
(5)至，到。
(6)谓极至，顶点。
(7)精致。
(8)絷，绊索。
(9)人质。
(10)通“鷙”。凶猛。
(11)引申为强毅。参见“摯剛”。
(12)通“輊”。车前低后高。
(13)古诸侯国名。在今河南省汝南县东南。夏奚仲之后，即薛。
(14)姓。周有挚荒，晋有挚虞。

摯字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摯； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页451第18
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?脂利切，音至。【說文】握持也。一曰至也。【爾雅·釋詁】臻也。【註】摯，執也，所以表至也。【書·西伯戡黎】大命不摯。【註】言受大命者，何不至也。【詩·周南·關雎傳】雎鳩摯而有別。【箋】摯之言至也，謂情意至然而有別。　又執物以爲相見之禮也。與贄質通。【禮·曲禮】凡摯，天子鬯，諸侯圭，卿羔，大夫鴈，士雉，庶人之摯匹。【周禮·春官·大宗伯】以禽作六摯。【註】所執以自致也。　又進也。【戰國策】近習之人，其摯諂也固矣。　又極也。【周禮·冬官考工記函人】凡甲鍛不摯，則不堅。【註】摯之言致。【疏】謂熟之至極。【前漢·韓安國傳贊】臨其摯而顛墜。　又傷折也。【禮·月令】孟春行冬令，則水潦爲敗，雪霜大摯。　又與鷙通。【禮·曲禮】前有摯獸，則載貔貅。【疏】摯獸，虎狼之屬。又【儒行】鷙蟲攫搏。【疏】蟲是鳥獸通名，但獸摯從執下手，鳥鷙從執下鳥。　又國名。【詩·大雅】摯仲氏任。【周語】昔摯疇之國也，由大任。【註】摯疇二國，任姓，奚仲仲虺之後，太任之家

摯字的源字形

小篆楷体

字形对比：

暂无。

[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" Zhi Liqie, Go to, Chapter. ]
Traditional characters for "zhi1".
(1) Hold.
(2) The gift you hold when you ask for a meeting. Popular as "Zhi".
(3) Fight and grab.
(4) Sincere and sincere.
(5) To, to.
(6) It is called the extreme, the apex.
(7) Exquisite.
(8) 絷, trip wire.
